body_html: @SsnL that's awesome. Does it make sense to have it as an attr to the RNN call? (in the spirit of being consistent with dropout, bidirectional, multi-layers? which basically could be implemented the same way). Seems a bit strange that the weight_norm is a separate call in the case of RNNs.
